meaningMnemonic: Under the <radical>ground</radical>, a <radical>head</radical> covered in <radical>dirt</radical> emerges... <kanji>again</kanji>! It's not the first time you've seen this buried head, nor is it the last. This dirt-covered head hides beneath the ground wherever you go, and keeps popping up to scare you again and again.
readingMnemonic: The dirt-covered head asks for help <kanji>again</kanji> and again, but you've only got a <reading>saw</reading> (さ). So you start digging with it, scraping the dirt away, until you see this head has the body of a <reading>cy</reading>borg (さい)!
